divs: sighting detailswhile shopping, at what was then farmer jacks supermarket, i,along with at least 8-12 people in parking lot, observed a metallic disc shaped object move in a triangular pattern. craft was not of earthly origin, as i have studied ufos pretty exstensively. disc shaped craft was about 5000 ft.{i was an airborne ranger in the army } day was cloudless, craft covered distances of 100+ miles in the blink of an eye. three times it did this, before it disappeared without any of us on the ground actually seeing it leave.....but i know that it did not disappear,it accelerated away at an unbelievable speed.of which was, and is unatianable by mankind. as this would exzert g forces inconcieveable to science.....area 51 you say,mmmmmmmmm !make no mistake about it, out government is by far, the leader in techniclogical innovation,in any given area....of science fiction & science fact. remember harrison fords role as indiana jones; at the entrance of a government werehouse, filled with crates far as the eye could see??????????you can,t handle the truth. p\s i was in the store checking out and noticed people looking up skyward while in the check out lane.my date&year might be off,but i know what i saw,i cannot be told different, that whati observed, was a man made object. if it were man made,our pilots would not blackout during hi-g manuvers...you better ask somebody.....me!
Summary: astounding and incredible, to say the least............................................
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around June 15th 1973
